Title: Поклади назад, поклади назад!
Description:
It's going to ruin everything! Who wants to visit a resort with a thirty-foot tall ghost-deer? Ok, no need to panic. It's probably just a little miffed you took its skull.

First, you gotta get rid of some of these slimes. Then, get that skull out of here. The farther the better.

Oh man, they're gonna get ectoplasm in the hot pools!
ObjectivesText: Розчавіть слимаків та винесіть череп Агаїнра з міста.
CompletionText: Поспіши, скоро це місце рухне нам на голови!
RewardText:
Whew, that was close. This whole thing has really taught me to value the beauty of nature.

<The goblin breaks into laughter.>

Really had you going there, huh? Still, think I'll leave Abyssal Excavation alone for awhile.
